entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: NW 44 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 70 gusting to 90 this morning then diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
